definition[0]: spoken or written in secret and intended to be kept secret

definition[1]: a confidential way of speaking or behaving shows that you do not want other people to know what you are saying
example[3]: His voice sank into a confidential whisper.
definition[2]: confidential information is spoken or written in private and intended to be kept secret
example[5]: A confidential letter was leaked to the press.
